module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>undo_log`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>undo_log` ( `changeId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `mode` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `tableName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `primaryKey` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `values` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`changeId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `mode` (`mode`), KEY `tableName` (`tableName`), KEY `primaryKey` (`primaryKey`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
